page.title: 11SHOPPING IN NORTH END
page.content: Our area has one of Portsmouth's big shopping centres: London Road.Here is one of the city's three Woolworths and its second Marks & Spencer.There are big shops for furniture,furnishings and clothes,branches of banks,building societies and estate agents. London Road has local shops, too,and there are more in Copnor Road and Twyford Avenue.Everywhere are corner shops,pubs and take-aways.People shop locally for their daily needs, and London Road is third choice after Commercial and Palmerston Roads. Copnor-Hilsea has one big attracti- on for shoppers from miles around: DIY hardware, wood and building suppl- ies.There are three stores-the local firm of G.A.Day, B&Q and Texas Home Store. Meanwhile in London Road a Big Mac is being built.
